appendix.title: Process::GID
appendix.para: IntegerProcess::GID.change_privilegegid Sets the real, effective, and saved group IDs of the current process to the given Integer, which it then returns.

IntegerProcess::GID.eid=eid Sets the effective group ID of the current process to the given Integer. If possible, also sets the saved group ID to the same value. Returns eid. Aliased by Process::GID.grant_privilege.
IntegerProcess::GID.re_exchange Swaps the real and effective group IDs. Sets the saved group ID to the new effective group ID, which it then returns.
true or falseProcess::GID.re_exchangeable? Returns true if this platform supports exchanging the real and effective group IDs; otherwise, false.
true or falseProcess::GID.sid_available? Returns true if this platform supports saved group IDs; otherwise, false.

ObjectProcess::GID.switch{ } Exchanges the effective and real group IDs of the current process, then returns the new effective group ID. If a block is given, the IDs are restored to their original values once it has been yielded to; the return value is that of the block.
